website_summaries.verdict: Insulated base layer is engineered to keep you warm even in severe weather conditions.
pros: Tag-less and front and back rise for comfort
Made by a brand dedicated to understanding the science of both weather and the appropriate clothing required for extreme environments
cons: May need to wear 2 layers in very cold conditions

customer_reviews.title: Best product to date for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I originally found these in a hunting store and was extremely pleased with the product. When you first touch these it doesn't feel thick enough to keep you warm. How wrong. I wore these under my duty pants throughout the winter, standing outside for hours at a time moving traffic along. Between the cold temp and blistering wind my legs never became cold because of the spun cotton and merino wool. I wore these till it wore thin around the legs where the pants rubbed. Glad I found these here. I purchased 2 this time. Definitely worth the money if you are outside in the dead of winter overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Here is a review from my boyfriend, the owner of the product: My girlfriend had a pair of these for many years and then handed them down to me. I wore them for years and like them so much I ordered a second pair of my own. I ride my bike to work and spend tons of time outdoors in All Seasons. They are incredibly warm and durable. They last forever through excessive washing and drying. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hammond

customer_reviews.title: jeans and coveralls and is good to go for winters outside in Iowa
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these that I have bought for my husband. They are true to size and he loves them. They are his thicker ones, not a base layer. He works construction and he wears these, jeans and coveralls and is good to go for winters outside in Iowa. He is a 32 waist and I got a medium, good sizing. They are soft on the inside, they don't itch. I'm sure I'll buy more for him and my two teenage sons.
customer_reviews.author: JaneWayne

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended! Soft

And they do the job, his butt is not freezing anymore! My hubby is very thankful. Highly recommended! Soft, warm, nice, comfortable, great quality, they don't itch, don't pull tiny hair (if you know what i mean lol), and you can wash them as many times you want to :))))! Thank you, ColdPruf! Good Job!

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, reasonably priced heavyweight base layer
customer_reviews.text: These seem too big out of the package, but they're truly wool & shrink in the washer/dryer, so the final result is well-fitting base layer. This dual layer pants are extra-warm. They're also a little thicker. If your outer pants are snug, they may be too tight with these underneath--just something that happens with multiple layers of clothes. My son & BF have these pants, as they work outside. They stay warm outside when it is -10F and being moderately active.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Vee

customer_reviews.title: Super warm & very comfy

It fits well and is warm. I wore these under jeans while out in 0 degree weather with a -12 wind chill. My legs didn't feel the cold. They were warm & comfy. Not itching or anything. I wholly recommend these to anyone looking for a warm pair of long johns.

customer_reviews.title: great fabric blend

Also, you can wear these a little longer before they smell ;-) Thanks for another great product.

customer_reviews.title: Effective, efficient and easy care
customer_reviews.text: Ye, these are more akin to the traditional 'long john' base layer in their styling/structure, which is exactly what I'm looking for: performance not fashion. This 50% cotton, 40% wool, 10% nylon blend is built for people who have to be outside in cold and inclement conditions, day in and day out. I wash them inside out in hot water and dry hot; their shrinkage is minimal, as is the pilling effect of the fabric. I have been wearing these now for two years, first in freezing Minnesota and now in the cold and damp of maritime Washington state; and I can't recommend them enough. Reasonable price, high efficiency and easy care. Who could ask for more?

product_meta.title: ColdPruf Men's Authentic Dual Layer Wool Plus Base Layer Bottom Unknown
product_meta.description: The AUTHENTIC two layer garment has been specifically engineered with our ColdPruf Insulation System to trap air between the layers of fabric to provide a natural warmth shield. The Outer Layer of MERINO WOOL, nature's warmest fiber, blended with Combed Ring Spun Cotton and Nylon and paired with 100%Combed Ring Spun Cotton on the Inside, offers the desired WARMTH and COMFORT in very cold to extremely cold weather conditions during low to medium activity. THE AUTHENTIC - NATURAL WARMTH AND COMFORT.
feature_bullets: Inside -100% Cotton; Outside - 50% Cotton, 40% Merino Wool, 10% Nylon
Two-layer engineering with Merino Wool, traps body heat between layers, resulting in chill-blocking warmth
Pant sits at natural waistline. Front and back rise provides an exceptionally comfortable fit and maintains coverage during various activities
Tagless labeling, non-itch waistband and gussets for added durability and comfortable fit
Perfect as a base layer. Best for dressing with minimal layers in extreme cold and low to medium activity levels. For best fit, wash before wearing
